price: 19. Taigi ištiko jį (t. y. sodą) tavo Viešpaties bausmė, kol jie miegojo,
arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faṭāfa ʿalayhā ṭāifun min rabbika wahum nāimūna
